name: Easy Reports for LearnDash
author: Graspcorn

sections.description:
“Easy Reports for LearnDash” is a comprehensive reporting plugin designed to provide
LearnDash administrators with detailed insights into course performance, lesson engagement,
quiz results, and student progress. With an intuitive and user-friendly interface, this plugin
empowers educators and administrators to make data-driven decisions to enhance the learning
experience.

Features

  • Dashboard Overview:

    • Enrolled Users: View the total number of users enrolled in courses.
    • Courses Completed by Users: Track the number of completed courses.
    • Courses: Get the count of all available courses.
    • Total Groups: Monitor the number of groups.
    • Average Completion Rate: See the average completion rate across all courses.
    • Top Courses This Week: Identify top-performing courses based on enrollment and completion rates.
    • Underperformed Courses This Week: Detect courses needing attention with low performance indicators.
    • Activity Graph: Visualize user activity and course completion trends over the week.
    • Course Comparison: Compare up to three courses based on completion rate, average score, and enrollment numbers.

  • Courses Report:

    • Comprehensive Course Details: Access detailed information for each course, including enrollment numbers, progress, average quiz scores, and completion rates.
    • Search Functionality: Quickly find specific courses using the search feature.
    • Export Options: Export course data to Excel or CSV for further analysis.

  • Users Report:

    • Detailed User Information: View reports for each user, including enrollment status, progress, completion rates, and last access date.
    • Search Functionality: Easily search for users by name or email.
    • Export Options: Export user data to Excel or CSV for comprehensive user management.

How It Helps Administrators

Easy Reports for LearnDash assists administrators in:
– Course Management:
– Gain valuable insights into the overall performance of all courses.
– Identify courses that require attention or improvement based on user engagement and completion rates.
– Compare the performance of multiple courses side-by-side to make informed decisions.

  • User Performance Tracking:

    • Monitor individual student progress and identify those who might need additional support.
    • Analyze user activity and performance to tailor educational strategies and interventions.
    • Access and export detailed user data for administrative and reporting purposes.

  • Enhanced Decision Making:

    • Utilize visual data representations to understand trends and patterns in user engagement and course completion.
    • Make data-driven decisions to enhance course content and delivery methods.
    • Improve overall educational outcomes by focusing on data-backed strategies.

Installation and Setup

  1. Download and Install: Download the “Easy Reports for LearnDash” plugin from the
    WordPress repository and install it on your LearnDash-powered site.
  2. Activate the Plugin: Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Local File Integration: All necessary CSS and JavaScript files are included locally within the plugin to ensure seamless operation without relying on external dependencies.
  4. Start Monitoring: Access the dashboard to start monitoring and analyzing course and user performance.

Libraries Used

This plugin uses the multi-select-tag library for enhanced multi-select functionality. You can review the non-minified source code of this library at the following link:

  • multi-select-tag: This library is used for handling multiple select tags in forms.

    • Non-minified Source Code
    • For more information, visit the multi-select-tag GitHub repository.

  • Chart.js: This library is used for creating beautiful charts and graphs.

    • Chart.js CDN

  • ApexCharts: This library is used for generating charts and graphs.

    • ApexCharts CDN

  • DataTables: This library is used for creating dynamic and interactive tables. You can access the unminified version via CDN:

    • DataTables Unminified CDN

  • Pdfmake: This library is used for creating PDFs. You can access the unminified version via Git:

    • Non-minified Source Code

Conclusion

“Easy Reports for LearnDash” is an essential tool for any LearnDash administrator looking to
enhance their reporting capabilities. With its comprehensive features and intuitive interface,
managing and improving the educational experience has never been easier. Download now and
take the first step towards data-driven educational success.

More Information

  • Website: https://graspcorn.com/
  • Feature Request: https://graspcorn.com/feature-request
  • Support: https://graspcorn.com/support
  • Become an Affiliate: https://graspcorn.com/affiliate-signup

For hardware options or additional support, please visit our website or contact our support team directly through the provided links.
sections.faq:
Do I need anything else to use this plugin?

Easy Reports for LearnDash is designed to work seamlessly with your WordPress site running LearnDash. Hereâ€™s what you need to get started:

  1. WordPress: Ensure you have a WordPress website set up where you can install plugins.
  2. LearnDash Plugin: Easy Reports for LearnDash requires LearnDash, a popular learning management system plugin for WordPress. Make sure LearnDash is installed and activated on your WordPress site.
  3. Courses and Users: Easy Reports for LearnDash analyzes data related to courses and users within LearnDash. Ensure your courses and user data are set up and managed within LearnDash.

Once these prerequisites are in place, you can install and activate Easy Reports for LearnDash to start generating insightful reports and analytics for your LearnDash courses.

For any additional questions or support needs, visit our Support Page or contact us through our Contact Form.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Initial release of Easy Reports for LearnDash.
